title: Sri Lanka African Swine Fever epidemic waning after claiming 67,000 pigs
byline: Some banks hesitate to give credit because fears of a resurgence of the disease

title: Sri Lanka to charge VAT on Paypal, Stripe, amid existing IMF MCPs
byline: Financial services are exempt from VAT in countries with well-functioning tax systems

title: Easter Sunday spy chief sacked ahead of Sri Lanka police clean-up
byline: His disciplinary inquiry was conducted by a three-member panel chaired by a retired High Court judge
